BACKGROUND

What does La Nina mean for Melbourne?

La Nina basically means, for Australia, and increased right of rainfall – particularly in Central, Eastern and Northern parts of the country. 

Along with the chance of increased rain, La Nina also increases the chance of flooding and cyclones in Australia. 

Find out more

Practicing Sustainability

Complementary to urban agriculture is the approach to pursuing sustainable practices in order to achieve the best – both for your garden and the environment. 

Find out more on sustainability and how it favors your garden.
